turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Donna, can you order me a coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure Turker, where do you want it from? You have a starbucks reward in your account.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh yes, starbucks would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, which location should I order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm headed towards to starbucks in the Potomac Village, on River Road. Can you send it to that location?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A cappuccino with one pump of vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One extra pump or just one pump?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: JUST ONE! It's too sweet otherwise.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm feeling sluggish, a grande would be perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular 2% is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any other extra sweeteners in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually yes, can you add one packet of the brown cane sugar to it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to confirm, I am sending this order to the starbucks on river road?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And you want a grande cappuccino with one pump of vanilla and one packet of the brown cane sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It should be ready in about 4 minutes!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Donna!
